description: Manage event attendance and guest details with an efficient RSVP form.
name: RSVP Form

steps.title: RSVP for [Event Name]
steps.text: To help us prepare for the event, please take a moment to fill out this RSVP form. Your response will ensure that we can accommodate you and your guests appropriately.

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Provide your email address to receive event updates.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Optional: Enter your phone number for any last-minute changes or updates.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Attendance Confirmation
blocks.help: Will you be attending the event?
blocks.name: attendance

blocks.label: Number of Guests
blocks.help: Indicate the number of guests you will be bringing.
blocks.name: number_of_guests

blocks.label: Additional Comments
blocks.help: Optional: Include any additional information or special requests.
blocks.name: comments
